body: When I am in game for some unknown reason /team or /t doesn't work. Once that is typed in and I hit enter after typing /t [commment] it displays the message "too many arguements". How do i fix this?
body_tagged: When I am in game for some unknown reason /team or /t doesn't work. Once that is typed in and I hit enter after typing /t [commment] it displays the message "too many arguements". How do i fix this?
title: Please Help!

replies.body:
/t enables / disables team chat -
/t - enables team chat
(message to team) 
/t - disables team chat (because it was enabled)
(message to everyone)
replies.body_tagged:
/t enables / disables team chat -
/t - enables team chat
(message to team) 
/t - disables team chat (because it was enabled)
(message to everyone)

replies.body: You can't type anything after the /t. Just type /t, hit enter. You're now in team chat. Then type normally. If you want to switch back, just do /t again.
replies.body_tagged: You can't type anything after the /t. Just type /t, hit enter. You're now in team chat. Then type normally. If you want to switch back, just do /t again.

replies.body:
Okay well these are the solutions I can give you.
1. Just do /t, wait for the argument to go through then type what you need to.
2. do /toggle--->Messages--->Global (It might have been set to no one)
Good Luck on Fixing it.
replies.body_tagged:
Okay well these are the solutions I can give you.
1. Just do /t, wait for the argument to go through then type what you need to.
2. do /toggle--->Messages--->Global (It might have been set to no one)
Good Luck on Fixing it.

replies.body: Omg i feel so dumb thanks u guys!
replies.body_tagged: Omg i feel so dumb thanks u guys!
